.. _`sambamba sort`:

SAMBAMBA SORT
=============

Sort bam file with sambamba





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule sambamba_sort:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            "mapped/{sample}.sorted.bam"
        params:
            ""  # optional parameters
        threads: 8
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/sambamba/sort"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
